DOC.brief_summary: The safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics/efficacy profile two different dos GSK233705 compare 2 active comparators placebo , medication deliver via dry powder inhaler .
DOC.brief_title: Safety And Efficacy Of GSK233705 Plus Salmeterol Compared With 2 Active Comparators And Placebo In Subjects With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.detailed_description: A multi-centre , randomise , partially blind , placebo-controlled , three-way crossover , incomplete block design study investigate , safety , tolerability , pharmacodynamics/efficacy pharmacokinetics dual bronchodilator therapy salmeterol 50 mcg twice daily plus two different dos GSK233705 ( 20 50 mcg twice daily ) , compare placebo , salmeterol 50 mcg twice daily alone , tiotropium 18 mcg daily alone , subject chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : female nonchildbearing potential postmenopausal ; history COPD define ATS/ERS criterion ; moderate COPD responsive ipratropium salbutamol ; current smoker exsmoker . Exclusion criterion : instable COPD ; max 1000 mcg inhale steroid per day ; Bblockers
